text: @RepAdamSchiff A Covid-19 test is reliable conditioned on whether a person stays isolated or not! If you leave isolation and touch a door knob/handle, an item in a store, paper dollars in change previous spent,  held by an infected C-19 carrier then your C-19 test result is no longer valid!
